divs: Sighting Detailsdriving through the country in the middle of the night..we were getting close to a bright light that i thought my be a chopper but as we got closer I realized the object was in still motion..as we got about 100 yards from the object that was low as the tree tops we stopped and got out of the car and the ufo had no sound what so ever..It was so bright that the car was very.. bright inside..I bowed to the ground in the middle of the road on my knees and prayed to god to forgive me for everything because I was sure we were getting ready to die..We got back in the car and was driving toward it and It looked like a shooting star as it disapered..we only live about a mile from the siteing..after about 5 min. As we were still looking at the sky air force jets were flying every where...Maybe the air force picked it up on radar...I'll never forget that night..My friend is a witness to it..I almost flipped out all I could do is pray...
Summary: over 100 yards wide,,very bright,,not a bit of sound..
